Completes external audit by analyzing and scheduling general ledger accounts; providing information for auditors.

Job Description:
• Provides and/or implements security and security protocols for all assigned facilities and information systems.
• Takes proactive steps to provide a safe and secure working environment to staff and visitors.
• Provides specialized security for and monitors access to limited and restricted access areas such as inventory areas, network equipment areas, and employee files and confidential records.

• Performs other related duties as assigned.

Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

Job Description:

2. Help to ensure that the construction project is completed within
its projected budget.
3. Up-to-date all reports from engineers at site.
4. Keep relevant legal documents such as contracts signed plans
from the project owner.
5. Calculate the cost of labor and prepared the document payment or
percentage payment (to subcontractors).
6. Propose a plan to conduct a site visit at any time when it is
necessary.
7. Sum up the volume of project implementation, based on the
overall conditions, for reporting project volumes and payments
to project manager.
8. Forecast the cost of the different materials needed for the
project.
9. Cooperate with site engineer and designer to be evaluate the
process growth at site construction.

such as project managers and site engineers.
11. Preparing reports directly to Project Manager.

- Excellent relationship-building and interpersonal skills.
- Good at team working.
- The ability to coordinate with project manager, designer and
Managing Director.
- Attention to detail and a methodical approach to work.
- Willing to work overtime and may be required to work in shifts.

Job Description:
** Duties and Responsibilities Duties and responsibilities are as following: 

** Curriculum and Instruction 
• Consistent and regular curriculum evaluation. 
• Evaluates and improves the planning process. 
• Evaluate lesson plans and observe classes when required. 
• Facilitates and monitors the alignment of curriculum, instruction, and assessment improvement in the accomplishment of goals, objectives and standards. 
• Review and approve teachers ’choices of supplementary material and designed booklets. 
• Collect and review weekly lesson plans from teachers and send feedback. 
• Analyze assessments results, design remedial plans 
• Check and revise syllabus of each course at the beginning of the year

** Staff Supervision and Evaluation 
• Protect confidentiality of records and information gained as part of exercising professional duties. 
• Ensure that staff supervision and evaluation procedures are accomplished in a fair and consistent manner that encourages accountability, growth and excellence in accordance with the school policy. 
• Supervise staff to ensure that all responsibilities are met.

** Grading Policy 
• Review instructional and grading policies, procedures, and standards to ensure consistency across the various grade levels. 
• Monitors and communicates benchmark exams, standardized tests and comparing data in the areas of curriculum, instruction, assessment, teaching and improvement.

** Communication 
• Display the highest ethical and professional behaviour and standards when working with students, parents, and school personnel. 
• Serve as a role model for students, dressing professionally, and demonstrating the importance and relevance of learning, accepting responsibility, and pride in the education profession. 
• Use effective presentation skills when addressing students, staff, parents, and the community, including appropriate vocabulary and examples. 
• Conduct surveys and meetings as necessary for the students, teachers, and the proper functioning of the whole department and relevant team and submit report to the Campus Manager.

** Attending Meetings, Conferences and Workshops: 
• Conduct department meetings regularly, carry agendas to and from higher meetings. 
• Aid in Staff development to expand and improve skills. 
• Attend required meetings and serve, as appropriate, on staff committees. 
• Continue to grow professionally through collaboration with colleagues and professional growth experiences. 
• Participates in School Improvement Plan reviews.

** Recruitment and New Staff Members: 
• Staff recruitment and recommendations for selection when vacancies occur. 
• Liaise with relevant departments in order to facilitate legal documents for native EFL teachers. 
• Orientation Facilities: 
• Ensure that the teaching facilities are maintained and ready for each new new term starts.
Job Requirement:
• Education: At least Bachelor degree in Education or related field
• English language: Cambridge B2 First Certificate, IELTS 5.5 or equivalent.
• Master Degree in Business or equivalent in related fields
• At least 2 years of relevant experience in education or business
• Good interpersonal skills and teamwork
• Native or excellence English language
• Excellent oral and written communication skills in order to deliver lecturers, workshops and presentations
• Networking skills in order to build relationships with other faculty member, both in the UK and within your own department
• Good research skills and the ability to organise your own workload and research group
• The ability to manage your time within competing demands and work under pressure
• The capability to work both independently and collaboratively as part of a team
• Good general IT skills.
• A flexible approach to work and willing to learn new things

** Salary and Benefits
• Competitive salary
• Paid holiday and observances, annual leave, sick leave, special leave
• NSSF Insurance
• Team Building budget: annual party, team building trip and staff annual trip
• Visa Fee expense and process (For foreign staff)
• Work Permit Fee expense and process (For foreign staff)

Job Description:
• Reporting to the Chief Executive Officer (CEO), the 
  Director of Construction is Responsible for managing 
  construction activities for the Authority’s light rail 
  projects.
• This includes oversight of the Authority’s contractors’ 
  performance, management of the Authority’s construction 
  staff, and other duties as necessary.
• Develops work plans and manages Authority construction 
  staff responsible for overseeing performance of 
  Authority’s contractors
• Monitors contractors’ work for compliance with schedule, 
  budget, quality, safety and overall conformance with the 
  contract documents
• Reviews contract documents and assists with procurement, 
  pre-bid conferences, and evaluations
• Coordinates activities with other Authority staff, 
  departments, and public agencies
• Resolves field construction problems in coordination with 
  engineering staff, third parties, and other agencies as 
  necessary.
• Attends progress meetings, develops status reports, and 
  delivers presentations as required
• Recommends policy and procedure improvements
• Assists in negotiating with contractors regarding changes 
  to design, added value engineering and cost saving, 
  construction work scope, and schedules
• Develops and implements a quality audit program, monitors 
  contractor corrective actions, and ensures a quality 
  project conforming to plans and specifications
• Monitors claims, suggests ways to mitigate impacts, and 
  develops workarounds
• Supports Authority safety vision and complies with all 
  safety rules, policies, and procedures, maintains 
  accountability for safety performance of subordinate 
  Personnel
• Signs Approved for Construction drawings
• Preparing work for the whole team
• Estimating costs
• Developing deliverable schedules as a road map for the 
  construction team
• Following the project in case there is a need to handle or 
  supervise some tasks
• Reviewing the project in depth to determine if everything 
  is done according to plan
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Civil Engineer or Project Management 
- Has 8-10 years or more then with project Manager and site manager

Job Description:
Summary of position
This role is responsible for leading bill payment collection to achieve onboarding numbers of corporate companies, SMEs, and governmental projects. Having experience in managing the end-to-end project from onboarding to implementation, ensuring the billing projects are delivered and implemented in a timely manner, and generating revenue through fees and charges of bill payment operation budget is met.

What you will do:
•	Own requirements analysis, business process design, and functional solution design of features being built into the digital platform
•	Gather, analyze, and interpret functional and non‐functional requirements to develop fit-for-purpose technology solutions along with various digital platform modules
•	Responsible for delivering the functional solution from an end‐to‐end perspective working with other technical partners
•	Come up with cost estimation activities for change requests
•	Manage and coordinate all digitally initiated projects and deliver an effective and timely manner
•	Lead project teams and ensure that they are motivated towards achieving overall team and business objectives
•	Ensure the final product solution is accurately documented, and detailed in all required parameters and procedures to facilitate an efficient sign‐off process and seamless implementations
•	Develop strong relationships with business stakeholders.
•	Keeping track of and reporting on project progress.
•	Completing any tasks assigned by the Line Manager in an efficient and timely manner.
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	At least Bachelor’s degree in business management, project management or other related fields
•	A minimum of 1 year of management experience
•	Experience in motivating a competitive and diverse team is also preferred
•	Strong problem-solving, analytical, and decision-making ability
•	Able to make the sound decision under pressure and commit to deadlines
•	Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple initiatives at one time and project and change management
•	Build an internal and external relationship
•	Strong initiative and a proactive attitude
•	Attention to detail and accuracy

Job Description: • Manage the month-end and year-end close process, including the review of journal entries, account reconciliations, and supporting schedules. • Perform financial statement analyses and work closely with business partners to explain fluctuations to support business decisions. • Lead accounting projects, including the design and implementation of key finance systems, internal controls, global close efficiency, audit readiness, and management reporting. • Support business leaders in completing special projects, ad-hoc reporting, and strategic analysis as requested. • Financial Report and Audit Report. • Mentor, teach, and review the work of other members of the accounting team. • Control daily cash count. • Prepares and records asset, liability, revenue, and expenses entries by compiling and analyzing account information. • Maintains and balances subsidiary accounts by verifying, allocating, posting, reconciling transactions; resolving discrepancies. • Maintains general ledger by transferring subsidiary accounts; preparing a trial balance; reconciling entries. • Summarizes financial status by collecting information; preparing balance sheet, profit and loss, and other statements. • Produces payroll by initiating computer processing; printing checks, verifying finished product. Completes external audit by analyzing and scheduling general ledger accounts; providing information for auditors.
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor degree in Finance and Accounting or related field 2. Minimum of 3 years' relevant experience in a Managerial Account 3. Familiar with accounting system4. Experience in Tax Declaration is a must 5. Good communication skills both verbal and written 6. Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills 7. Good interpersonal skills with the ability to sustain effective relations internally and externally at all levels of a large organization

Job Description:
Position Objective
Customer Satisfaction, Quality /Tester, Car Body Repair shop Clean, Maintain Equipment, Tools, Gauges and calibration

Responsibilities:
- Prepare Daily morning briefly meeting with staffs at 8.00am (Greeting, overview work in progress to be complete)
- Prepare Daily performance result report and submit to top management every evening
- Prepare Daily report of car pending in workshop and submit to top management every evening
- Prepare the reports of weekly performance indication (WPI) and submit every Friday
- Prepare Purchase Request as need within the branch (maintenance, consumable, tools and stationaries)
- Prepare Staffs Monthly standby schedule every 26th, of the month
- Prepare Incentive Request and support document submit every 15th of the month
- Record staff daily attendant send to the staff’s attendant group at 9am morning and 2pm afternoon.
- Record staff daily overtime and prepare OT list submit to HR every 15th of the month.
- Confirm job card and distribute to B&P team leader for completing job.
- Monitor B&P job which receive from insurance company
- Coordinate and supporting SA for customer walk in or agreement for job estimation.
- Supervise job and processing as sequent service ordering
- Evaluate B&P work and suggest estimate repair for quotation.
- Assist B&P staff to complete major B&P job
- Evaluate B&P staffs work performance
- Control material as per requirement for B&P work
- Monitor B&P staffs for proper parts remove and install
- Perform QC for car exterior and interior cleaning after completing B&P service.
- Perform Self-check on finishing of denting job before sending to car body paint spray.
- Check and verify which is noted visible damage down on job order by team leader.
- Keep B&P service standard by follow workshop manual and car body and paint instructions.
- Monitor B&P staffs to keep work bay cleaned and tidy.
- Monitor the Request labour time if insufficient and inform service advisor for extra time.
- Check and verify list parts or consumable material requirement during service-to-service advisor to input.
- Write B&P service report as per require by management.
Job Requirement:
- A certified in Car body & paint
- 4-8 years of experiences in Body and Paint business
- Self-motivated and self-organized with the ability to work independently
- Good mix of technical skill
- Knowledge of the English language, both oral and written in fair/good. If have
- Prior experience in Automobiles business would be an advantage.

Job Description: Position Objective	Stock Controller is tasked with stock controlling, procure and secure stock parts.Roles & Responsibilities	Operation/Performance:•	To control inventory within operation.  •	To procure and securely stock parts.  •	To operate stock inventory and records system.•	To ensure the appropriate stock level for demanding.•	To ensure all stock records are up-to-date and accurate.•	To carry out annual and periodic stock taking to ensure accuracy of records.•	To ensure stock damage and wastage does not exceed agreed limits.•	To provide Head of Operation with weekly/monthly reports on stock situation.•	To ensure stock is kept in good condition.•	To ensure that stock is only issued in accordance with policy regarding payment or charge.•	To guard against unauthorized withdrawal from stock.•	To maintain stock control system.•	To care for stock control, plant and record systems.

Job Description:
Position Objective
Branch Manager is tasked with planning, People, Service/Performance, Marketing Strategy of the company.

Planning
• Strategy
• Prepare Action plan for Management and HOO
• Prepare Budget plan for Management and HOO

People
• Ensure that training standards are fully maintained so that future manpower requirements are covered.
• Operate staff performance appraisal systems and ensure action taken on results.
• To establish the levels of staff required to achieve the established budgets.
• In consultation with training personnel establish training needs, plan programmed and maintain records of training.  Ensure up-to-date and accurate documentation to allow grant redemption.
• Review staff’s attendant and request incentive of achievement for service and workshop staffs. 

Service & Performance
• Propose appropriated to purchase stock, consumables, short-life tools and other service-related products.
• Dailly Control and Prepare Processes of Operation (SOP)
• Tracking on Quality of service providing to customer
• Review with Head of Operation all sectional activities and reporting systems.
• Check the activities in the service and workshop, inspect completed work for compliance with safety and other statutory regulations.
• Monitor workshop productive performance daily, by total and individual technician/mechanic.
• Monitor Service performance revenue daily.
• Establish adequate safety and security procedures to protect property and company personnel.
• Check all workshop equipment for condition and accuracy of diagnosis.
• Ensure adequate maintenance of tools, equipment and other materials in the Branch.

Marketing
• Draw up and initiate service marketing plans.
• Instigate and operate advertising and promotional activities.
• In collaboration with Sales Department, establish system and method of ensuring all vehicle owners are introduced to Service Department and key personnel.
• Maintain record of customer complaints and/or congratulations for use and action as required.
Job Requirement:
• Knowledge and experience with automotive industry
• Ability to control clerical work, administration, organization, systems and financial matters, leadership ability
• Up-to-date knowledge of vehicle legislation, consumer legislation and trade practices
• Skills, experience and knowledge of modern business methods and financial control
• Good with English languages
• Have ability to work under pressure and deadline

Job Description:
Position Objective
Responsible to manage accounting and Tax works, maintain accounting Teams and manage all payment (bank/cheque/petty cash), AR & AP

Company visit, Lunch and Dinner with guest as required; • Manage travels of the boss such as air ticket, hotel booking, car rental, budget planning. trip schedule, expenses clearing and documents preparation; -Manage company and personal confidential data (soft and hard copies); -Check the monthly payroll for employees; Deliver messages from Top management down to all related persons and ensure for the returned quick response. • Perform other tasks as required

job title: Project Manager Urgent , Chinese Speaking ( Negotiate)
position: Project Manager Urgent , Chinese Speaking ( Negotiate)
Job Description: • Preparing schedule or project timeline for construction projects, coordinating and monitoring the work breakdowns of project implementations;• Checking the drawing of Consultants or internal architects to minimize error in drawings before construction works;• Monitoring work compliances of Contractors/Sub-Contractors to the drawing standards and specifications, and performing inspections of QA/QC and site safety practices;• Assisting in controlling BOQ, budgeting, project scheduling and subordinates’ performances mainly the architects, engineers and site labors;• Cooperating and communicating with MEP Manager, Construction Manager, Site Manager, Consultants, Contractors/Sub-Contractors and other project participants to provide assistances;• Performing some simple quantity surveying works and producing some simple drawings;• Monitoring Contractor’s site safety performance when conducting site spot-check and reporting to Contractor’s safety officer if found something not complied;• Monitoring concrete test results for each casting• Reviewing, collecting, summarizing and reporting the weekly status of project implementations to CCO regularly;• Performing other tasks as assigned by Management
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering;• Minimum 5 years of work experiences in construction and project implementations;• Strong project management skill particularly the construction projects;• Positive thinking, dynamic teamwork, self-motivation, time management, disciplinary, respectful, helpful, supportive, communicative, cooperative and result-oriented;• Computer literacy in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint), AutoCad and MS Project;• Khmer and English are acceptable;• Mobile from Office to site when necessary;** Salary and Benefits• Salary: competitive salary, which is negotiable, based on experiences and work duration;• Salary increment annually;• Annual staff party and random parties based on public calendar ceremonies;• Internal and external trainings of both soft and hard skills;• Privileged for special prices for house loan;• Pays of National Social Security Fund and Seniority;

Job Description:
1. STRATEGY DEVELOPMENT:
- Monitor, analyze and evaluate market, consumer behaviors & competitor activity to identify market opportunities. Develop our annual Marketing strategy & budget plan.
- Develop branding strategy to maximize brand awareness and visibility across all communication channels
- Regularly review and update the plan, taking into account the school targets

2. MARKETING EFFICIENCY:
- Create a complete marketing plan and ensure excellent results of implementation
- Create high-quality market material tailored to the Cambodian market
- Build up & lead to implement marketing programs, experiences, sponsorship or promotions for products/ brands, including CRM, loyalty programs, sampling and promotions, advertising campaigns, all types of media
- Implementing the launching of new products
- Allocate resources and schedule marketing and advertising activities efficiently
- Coordinate with advertising & promotion agencies for effective sales campaigns & promotions to the target audience
- Monitor all marketing initiatives performance to achieve the most effective ROI
- Guidance and training of team members as well as support in achieving the best possible performance
- Ensure clear communication and objectives among all team members in any marketing plan

3. PR & BRANDING:
- Develop brand positioning
- Lead brand management operations & implement annual brand/marketing strategy effectively
- Support brand awareness and favorability through comprehensive spokesperson, sponsorship and expert speaker initiatives & programs
- Monitor, analyses, and evaluate product performance and customer feedback to improve the brand image and company’s reputation
- Develop & monitor training programs/workshops in order to promote the brand knowledge to distributors effectively
4. BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT
- Adapt plans/ initiatives to improve the sales performance
- Work closely with related stakeholders; enabling them to meet their sales target by providing them with appropriate promotion mechanism, sales tools, marketing materials and
presentations
- Expand sales opportunities via different channels (offline and online)
- Identify and develop any possibility of acquiring new customers

5. CUSTOMER SATISFACTION
- Undertake continuous analysis of competitive environment and consumer trend
- Evaluate the impact of marketing programs in achieving their stated objectives, including impact on lead flow, LTV and retention
- Propose and manage marketing research projects to generate consumer insights in support of improved marketing strategy and communications
Job Requirements
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree or higher, Major in Marketing, Management or Business administration
- Minimum 5 years of experience in similar positions
- Excellent knowledge of the healthcare sector and the Cambodian market
- Proficient analytical & strategic business planning skills
- Creative mindset & networking skills
- Excellent communication & presentation skills
- Excellent negotiation & conflict resolution skills
- Distinctive customer focus & relationship management
- Entrepreneurial mindset & leadership skills
- Proficiency in motivating & inspiring others
- Well organized, result oriented and able to work under high pressure
- Positive attitude & high level of maturity
- Very good knowledge of English (spoken & written)

Job Description: IntroductionA great opportunity has arisen with a leading coffee supplier company in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. We looking for a B2B, Manager, Marketing and Branding who can own their B2B marketing campaigns across the full marketing mix.The successful candidate will need proven experience in Campaign Management, able to produce quality content, PR, and email marketing, and be commercially minded.ResponsibilitiesCollaborate with the Shareholders in executing the company’s B2B marketing strategy and programs (internal/external branding, lead generation, advertising/sponsorships, events, digital marketing) in order to support the company’s business objectives. Focused on acquiring and retaining new customers through the management of all online and offline marketing programs including, PPC, SEO/SEM, digital advertising, webinars, content syndication, email, social, lead nurturing, channel marketing, and analytics. Collaboration with an array of cross-functional team members and external vendors is essential to increasing marketing's contribution to revenue. This position requires a candidate with a blend of strategy, technical, creative, analytic, and project management expertise.Role Requirements• Working on B2B marketing campaigns across the full marketing mix• Delivering the content marketing strategy across multiple channels• Manage the social media accounts creating relevant content, video, and blogs• Create content to support events and webinars• Web copywriter and content creation• Driving marketing through CRM systems• Market research and campaign planning• Press releases and media planning with the external PR agency• Email and postal DM marketing• Track and report on campaign performance• Work across the group's brands as required

Company Profile:
GBS is a one-stop company for coffee and tea solutions, which is reflected in our logo. Founded in 2016, GBS mission was to foster Cambodian coffee industry through the 3 pillars – product, service and knowledge.
At GBS, we always look out to bring top quality products from around the world to combine with our best-in-class after-sales service. We are currently representing more than 20 brands in Cambodian market including, Nuova Simonelli, Victoria Arduino, Caffé Barbera, Lavazza, Hario, Iberital, Eureka, ODK, Blendtec, Hoshizaki, Melitta, Proaster, D&B, Monbana, Acaia, 3M Water Filtration, and others.
Acknowledging the complication of establishing or expanding a coffee business, thanks to a wide range of product offer, GBS focuses on providing a solution-based product package according to the customers’ individual request and business demand.
We offer complementary training as our barista demonstrates their skill and know-how to assist customer for the challenges in the coffee business environment. We also offer advanced barista and latte art classes for those who would like to further develop their skills.
We take pride in our technical service, as we receive many positive feedbacks since our day one in business. We invest significantly in spare parts to ensure our customer’s machine downtime is limited to the minimum. To compliment this, we ensure that our technicians are well-trained with technical knowledge and are always ready to respond to request for maintenance and repairs.
In 2018, GBS established B-Hub Barista Training Center to offer high quality barista training with tools and resources that allow student to dive deeper into a coffee world. In 2019, GBS began moving toward commercial and specialty coffee roasting, adding three more coffee blends into our product portfolio, as well as customizing special blends to meet the demand. In May 2020, we welcome our new showroom in Siem Reap, which is 40% bigger in space with a dedicated training room.
With all

Job Description: Barista Trainer Job DescriptionWe are searching for an engaging, courteous Barista who is passionate about food and beverage preparation and education. The Barista will greet customers, answer their questions, take orders and accept payments, and prepare and serve food and drinks. You will also maintain a clean and well-stocked workspace and dining area, update displays, and continuously expand your knowledge of food and beverage quality controls, preparation methods, and presentation.To succeed as a barista, you should be committed to providing customers with excellent service. You should be positive, friendly, knowledgeable, and polite.Responsibilities:•	Welcoming customers, informing them about specials or new items, answering questions, and accepting orders and payments.•	Preparing foods, such as sandwiches or baked goods, and grinding and blending coffee beans, brewing coffee and tea, and serving items to customers.•	Packaging food and beverages for sale.•	Selling coffee and tea blends and brewing equipment, highlighting the differences between items and educating customers about brewing methods.•	Cleaning and restocking work and dining areas, emptying trash, and sanitizing equipment and utensils.•	Learning about brewing methods, beverage blends, food preparation, and presentation techniques to improve food quality.•	Updating signage and displays to attract customers.•	Taking inventory and replenishing items in display cases, at tables, or behind the counter.•	Working as part of a fun, high-energy team.•	Adhering to all food safety regulations and quality controls.
Job Requirement: Requirements:•	High School Diploma or equivalent.•	Experience in food and beverage preparation or customer service preferred.•	Training and willingness to continue learning about food and beverage preparation.•	Exceptional listening and communication skills.•	Ability to walk, bend, and stand for extended periods.•	Availability to work around peak hours, including nights, early mornings, weekends, and holidays.•	A polite, engaging personality.•	Commitment to customer satisfaction and service excellence.•	Willingness to work as part of a high-energy, efficient team in a fast-paced environment.Competitive and Benefit 1. We are currently representing more than 20 brands in Cambodian market including, Nuova Simonelli, Victoria Arduino, Caffé Barbera, Lavazza, Hario, Iberital, Eureka, ODK, Blendtec, Hoshizaki, Melitta, Proaster, D&B, Monbana, Acaia, 3M Water Filtration, and others.
Acknowledging the complication of establishing or expanding a coffee business, thanks to a wide range of product offer, GBS focuses on providing a solution-based product package according to the customers’ individual request and business demand.
We offer complementary training as our barista demonstrates their skill and know-how to assist customer for the challenges in the coffee business environment. We also offer advanced barista and latte art classes for those who would like to further develop their skills.
We take pride in our technical service, as we receive many positive feedbacks since our day one in business. We invest significantly in spare parts to ensure our customer’s machine downtime is limited to the minimum. To compliment this, we ensure that our technicians are well-trained with technical knowledge and are always ready to respond to request for maintenance and repairs.
In 2018, GBS established B-Hub Barista Training Center to offer high quality barista training with tools and resources that allow student to dive deeper into a coffee world. In 2019, GBS began moving toward commercial and specialty coffee roasting, adding three more coffee blends into our product portfolio, as well as customizing special blends to meet the demand. In May 2020, we welcome our new showroom in Siem Reap, which is 40% bigger in space with a dedicated training room.

Job Description:
As a STORE VISUAL MERCHANDISING, you will be responsible for adapting and communicating the company merchandising guidelines to the local stores to improve sales and customer satisfaction. You will work mainly in the TOP stores to develop and adapt HQ visual merchandising ideas to the local market. You will work very close with your Commercial Director to prepare and deliver the “Sales Workshop” to Commercials.

Your main duties will be:
• Sales Management: Analyzing the sales reports to identify priorities to work during the following days (opportunities, potential and problem subfamilies).
• Store image: Create and adapt visual merchandising proposals according to these priorities.  And create a unified and tailored solution for the different types of stores (ABCD).
• Follow up: Gather feedback from Commercials and Store Managers on the week’s proposals and make improvements.
• Sales Workshop Management: Coordinate with Commercial Director to develop the  commercial/merchandising skills of the Commercials and Managers. Also, work on the improvement of the Sales Workshop in general.
Job Requirement:
• Customer oriented, Fulfilling all duties, Integrity, Fashion awareness, Communication, Eager for success, Pressure management, Teamwork, Developing others, planning & organization, Systematic thinking, innovation, Empowerment and motivation.
• From 7 to University degree
• Fluent local language and English
• PC skills (MS Office, user level)

job title: ជំនួយការការិយាល័យកម្មវិធីសិក្សាជាតិ
position: ជំនួយការការិយាល័យកម្មវិធីសិក្សាជាតិ
Job Description: តួនាទីសំខាន់ៗ៖- ទទួលបន្ទុកពង្រឹងបទដ្ឋានអប់រំ និងលើកកម្ពស់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាក្រោមកិច្ចសហការជាមួយអនុប្រធាន និងប្រធានការិយាល័យសិក្សាជាតិ និងគណៈនាយក- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើ របាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យថ្នាក់បឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សាទាំងអស់ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា និងឯកសារបណ្ណសាររដ្ឋបាលជាដើម- ចូលរួមការងារអធិការកិច្ចថ្នាក់រៀន ត្រួតពិនិត្យវិន័យសិស្ស សហការណ៍ជាមួយក្រុមការងារការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាលសាលា - ចូលរួមពិនិត្យតាមថ្នាក់ដើម្បីប្រាកដថាថ្នាក់និមួយៗមានគ្រូ  និងរាយការណ៍ជូននាយករងក្នុងករណីគ្រូណាមិនមក ឬមកយឺតបើមានគ្រូសុំច្បាប់មិនបានមកបង្រៀន ហើយត្រូវជូនដំណឹងដល់អនុប្រធាន និងប្រធានការិយាល័យសិក្សាជាតិ រៀបចំចាត់ចែងរកគ្រូជំនួស- សម្របសម្រួលសកម្មភាពសិក្សា និងសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតគ្រប់ថ្នាក់បឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សា និងធានាឱ្យបាននូវ ដំណើរការដោយរលូននៃថ្នាក់សិក្សានីមួយៗ
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ៖       	- បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកអប់រំ ឫបរិញ្ញប័ត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងវិស័យអប់រំ ឫវិស័យពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំ- មានសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងមានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម- មានជំនាញរដ្ឋបាល និងសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការរៀបចំ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន និងចេះប្រើ Microsoft Officeអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ និងពាក់កណ្តាលថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ - សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

job title: ជាងជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ទឹក-ភ្លើង
position: ជាងជួសជុល ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ទឹក-ភ្លើង
Job Description: តួនាទីសំខាន់ៗ: - ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងជាងសំណង់ និងលាបថ្នាំអាគារ - ជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង-ទឹក កាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព គ្រឿងអគ្គីសនីផ្សេងៗនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន - ជួសជុលកែលម្អ តុ កៅអី និងគ្រឿងសង្ហារឹមផ្សេងៗនៅក្នុងថ្នាក់រៀន និងនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន - ជួសជុល និងថែទាំគ្រឿងប្រដាប់បន្ទប់ទឹក លាងFilterម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ប្តូរអំពូល និងធ្វើការងារជួសជុលទូទៅ - ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការចាំបាច់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ: - មានកម្រិតវប្បធម៍ថា្នក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងនឹងការដំឡើងប្រព័ន្ធទឹក-ភ្លើង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ចាប់ពី ១ឆ្នាំឡើង - ចេះសរសេរ ស្តាប់ និងអានភាសាខ្មែរ បានល្អ - ឧស្សាហ៍ ព្យាយាម និងស្មោះត្រង់ក្នុងការងារ - រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អក្នុងការងា ហើយរអាចធ្វើការជាក្រុមបាន

job title: គ្រូបង្រៀនកម្រិតបឋម
position: គ្រូបង្រៀនកម្រិតបឋម
Job Description: - ទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការបង្កើត និងលើកកម្ពស់បទដ្ឋានអប់រំខ្ពស់សម្រាប់សិស្សទាំងអស់ ដូចជាការគោរពវិន័យ ការសីលធម៌ខ្ពស់ឧតម្តភាពក្នុងការសិក្សា និងការអភិវឌ្ឍលើចរិកលក្ខណៈរបស់សិស្ស- ទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការរៀបចំថ្នាក់ និងមេរៀនដើម្បីបង្កើនការអភិវឌ្ឍការសិក្សា និងយល់ដឹងរបស់សិស្សឲ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ក៏ដូចជាបង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយសិស្សប្រកមដោយក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈដើម្បីសិក្សាបន្ថែមពីភាពខ្លាំង និងភាពខ្សោយរបស់សិស្សក្នុងការរៀបចំកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀនឲ្យសមស្របនឹងសមត្ថភាពរបស់សិស្ស- ទទួលបន្ទុកធ្វើកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន ផែនការបង្រៀនសម្រាប់រយៈមួយសប្ដាហ៍ម្ដង រៀបចំឯកសារប្រឡងផ្សេងៗប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សានីមួយៗ។ រាល់ឯកសារប្រឡងផ្សេងៗត្រូវបញ្ជូនមកប្រធានការិយាល័យកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាខ្មែរពិនិត្យ មុននឹងបញ្ជូនដល់នាយកសាលា ឬនាយិកាសាលា- ធ្វើការសហការជាមួយក្រុមការងារកម្មវិធីភាសាខ្មែរ ក្រុមការងាររដ្ឋបាលសាលាអន្តរជាតិ នាយកសាលា ឬនាយិការងដើម្បីជាការលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ក្រុមការងារ- ទទួលបន្ទកក្នុងការកំណត់កិច្ចការផ្ទះ ឬលំហាត់ផ្សេងៗសម្រាប់សិស្សដែលរាល់កិច្ចការផ្ទះ និងលំហាត់ទាំងនោះត្រូវអនុលោមទៅតាមគោលការណ៍។
Job Requirement: តួរនាទីសំខាន់៖	- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យពិន្ទុកសិស្ស- ​កម្រិត​វប្បធម៌​ថ្នាក់​បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- មាន​បទ​ពិសោធ​ន៌បង្រៀន​យ៉ាងតិច 3 ឆ្នាំ​- មានការ​តស៊ូ​ ភាព​អំណត់​ នឹង​ការងារ​- មាន​អាយុ​ចាប់ពី​25ឆ្នាំ​ ដល់​45ឆ្នាំ​- មាន​បុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈ​រួសរាយ​រាក់ទាក់​ ស្មោះត្រង់​ និង​ក្រម​សិល​ធម៌​ល្អ​។អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិ- ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

Job Description: Responsibilities:-	Assist homeroom teachers-	Assist in maintaining a fair and well-disciplined atmosphere in the classroom and to display a professional attitude and loyalty to the school. -	Manage the class discipline and order -	Be actively involved in all class activities and assignments -	Ensure every student’s safety -	Assist and support students at all times at school -	Ensure the cleanliness of the classroom and help with general housekeeping. -	Attend all school activities assigned by the Vice Principal or the School Principal
Job Requirement: Requirements & Qualifications:-	Bachelor Degree in English, Baccalaureate or Equivalent certificate -	At least one -year working experience in a school or any related field -	Good spoken and written English -	Able to work under pressure -	Hardworking and honest -	Strong organizational skills, communication skills and problem solving skills Other benefits: -	Work day: Monday to Friday and Half-Saturday -	NSSF insurance (both accident & health) -	Annual salary review -	Paid annual leave day -	Annual year-end party -	and many more

job title: ប្រធានកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាខ្មែរ
position: ប្រធានកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាខ្មែរ
Job Description: តួរនាទីសំខាន់៖	- ទទួលបន្ទុកពង្រឹងបទដ្ឋានអប់រំ និងលើកកម្ពស់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាក្រោមកិច្ចសហការជាមួយគណៈនាយក- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើ របាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យថ្នាក់បឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សាទាំងអស់ដូចជា ការកំណត់ល្បឿនបង្ហាត់  វិញ្ញសារប្រឡងប្រវត្តិរូបសិស្ស របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា និងឯកសារបណ្ណសាររដ្ឋបាល ជាដើម- ទទួលបន្ទុកដោះស្រាយរាល់ការទំនាក់ទំនង និងតម្រូវនានា ជាមួយក្រសួងអប់រំ មន្ទីអប់រំ និងស្ថាប័នដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ- ទទួលបន្ទុកចុះអធិការកិច្ចគ្រូបង្រៀនភាសាខ្មែរគ្រប់មុខវីជ្ជាទាំងអស់យ៉ាងហោចម្តងក្នុងមួយឆមាសដើម្បីពង្រឹង គុណភាអប់រំរបស់គ្រូនិមួយៗ- ទទួលបន្ទុកសម្របសម្រួលសកម្មភាពសិក្សា និងសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតគ្រប់ថ្នាកបឋម និងមធ្យមសិក្សា និងធានាឲ្យបាននូវដំណើរការដោយរលូននៃថ្នាក់សិក្សានិមួយៗ
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ៖       	- បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកអប់រំ ឫបរិញ្ញប័ត្រពាក់ព័ន្ធ- វិញ្ញាបនប័ត្រគរុកោសល្យ- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងវិស័យអប់រំ ឫវិស័យពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិច 2 ឆ្នាំ- មានសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងមានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើម- មានជំនាញរដ្ឋបាល និងសមត្ថភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការរៀបចំ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន និងចេះប្រើ Microsoft Officeអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ និងពាក់កណ្តាលថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ - សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

job title: សន្តិសុខ (5 នាក់)
position: សន្តិសុខ (5 នាក់)
Job Description: តួនាទីសំខាន់ៗ៖•	ទទួលបន្ទុកធានារក្សាសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងសន្តិសុខក្នុងបរិវេណសាលាទាំងមូល•	ទទួលបន្ទូកអនុវត្តឱ្យបាននូវគ្រប់ភារកិច្ចដែលបានចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក•	ទទួលសិស្សចូល និងចេញពីសាលា និងធ្វើចរាចរឱ្យរថយន្តចេញ-ចូលបានស្រួល និងធានានូវសុវត្ថិភាព•	ទទួលបន្ទុកជួយយួរកាបូបសិស្សក្មេងៗ និងសម្របសម្រួលការងារផ្សេងៗដល់អតិថិជនក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់•	ទទួលបន្ទុកធានាឱ្យបាននូវសុវត្ថិភាពចំពោះសិស្ស អតិថិជន និងបុគ្គលិកក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងមូល•	ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពនានានៅក្នុងសាលាដែលបានចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានក្រុម ឬប្រធានផ្នែក។
Job Requirement: គុណវុឌ្ឍិ៖•	ចេះភាសាខ្មែរ សរសេរ ស្តាប់ និងអាន បានល្អ•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ (មានអាទិភាព)•	ឧស្សាហ៍ ព្យាយាម និងស្មោះត្រង់ក្នុងការងារ•	មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារខ្ពស់។

Job Description:
*Duties 
• Onsite purchase (market and/or required locations)
• Review purchases and corresponding receipts and work closely with inventory team 
• follow up the purchased items to make sure that it delivered on time with both good quality and accurate quantity.
• Provide all relevant documents to inventory team in order to record in accounting system 
• Other tasks assigned by Supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: *Requirements & Qualifications• At least year 4 student of Accountancy or equivalent • Independent and self-driven. • Must be a meticulous self-starter and have the ability to multi-task to meet tight timelines. • Good communication, problem solving and organizational skills. • Knowledge of computer skills • Must be honest, trustworthy and detail oriented.* Commencement Salary: 250$ - 300$* Salary: Negotiable (based on qualifications and experience)* Benefits:• Work day: Monday to Friday and Half-Saturday• Insurance (both accident & health)• Annual salary review • Paid annual leave day• Annual year-end party• and many more

Job Description: • Implement marketing activities to achieve effective communications and expand brand awareness to target consumers based on agreed plan and budget.• Identify opportunities for activating brand to new channels and/or consumer segments to expand awareness.• Work closely with all functions to communicate a coherent brand identity in merchandizing and promotion activities and execute brand activities on time.• Regularly monitor and analyze own brand and competitors’ performance in the market in order to continuously provide insightful updates and recommendations to line manager.• Monitor and collect relevant market data including market trends and new development and utilize information for brand improvement.• Monitor, collect and analyze necessary market data and provide insight information on market trends and new development to Brand Manager for the development action plan and brand improvement.• Submit competitive report on both ATL and BTL activities, as well as a monthly monitoring report (signage, POSM, premium products, etc.).• Other tasks assigned by superior.

Job Description:
• Supervising, managing, and leading to operate procurement process as professional input method.
• Developing and initiating procurement policy, procedures, guidelines, rules and regulations in order to implementing professional procurement efficiency and transparent practices.
• Designing strategies to response the company strategy plan and budgeting.
• Regularly check various vendors/suppliers to obtain quotations of goods for best values.
• Frequently dealing with suppliers to do price negotiation and discount.
• Review supplier evaluation form and issue purchase order.
• Regularly seeking for new appropriate suppliers and update to suppliers list.
• Networking with wholesale and reputed suppliers to company.
• Strong communication skills and daily working closely with procurement team, finance team, and requesters.
• Must be high responsible for deadline requisition bases.
• Review all expense report for subordinates.
• Ability to persuade vendor for creditable and cheque payment.
Job Requirement:
• A Master/Bachelor’s degrees in Business Administration or any other relevant fields
• At least 5+ or more years of work experiences in Procurement
• Strong leadership capabilities
• Computer literacy especially MS Office
• Familiarity with sourcing and vendor management
• Solid judgement along with decision making skills
• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills
• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.
• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem solving skills

*How to apply:

1. Submit your CV and Cover Letter with a 4x6 Current Photo to our email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh. Please be noted that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’ and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g., CV_Name.

Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh,Cambodia.

Tel: (855) 12 797 939 (Mon-Fri, 7:30am to 6:00pm.)

Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
-	Ensure accurate and reliable periodic financial reports.
-	Prepare and review financial budget plan.
-	Managing account receivables and cash flows.
-	Prepare management report with commentary analysis on the financial result.
-	Review and enhance internal control relating to Physical assets control, revenue, expenses.
-	Coordinate and deal with internal auditor & external auditor.
-	Provide coaching and training to team.
-	Maintain a documented system of accounting policies and procedures
-	Forecast cash flow positions, and available Budget for investment

-	Knowledge of accounting software & advance excel
-	Self-motivate and independent
-	Self-organize, good communication & team work

Job Description: •	Potentially lead and supervise junior and senior accounting staff at the assembly plant.•	Good knowledge about manufacturing process and accounting.•	Assist in the setup of accounting system and process flow at the assembly plant.•	Be in charge of inventory costing and reporting for raw materials, semi-finished products and finished products.•	Daily check and monitor on inventory movements and coordinates in physical stock count and reconciliations.•	 Assist Accounting Manager in supervising accounting team at the assembly plant.•	 Review payable and payment documents, as well as invoicing and sale documents.•	Review on accounting entries in autoline system.•	Perform month end reconciliation.•	Provide necessary information to tax team & financial reporting team on a regular and ad-hoc basis.•	Support Accounting Manager/ FC/ Operation Manager in the implementation of necessary controls at the assembly plant.•	Become a sound financial partner to the Head of Plant.•	Manage the account transaction.•	 Other tasks assigned by Accounting Manager/ FC.
Job Requirement: •	Essential solid accountancy training and experience-professional accounting qualification•	University degree in accounting, finance or related fields•	Degree from CAT, ACCA/CPA is preferred•	Essential 5 year’s experiences in related position and industry•	Advance in Ms. Office and good command in accounting systems or ERP is preferred•	Experienced and knowledge in Cambodian Tax Laws and tax declaration is a plus•	Very good understanding and commands in written and spoken of English and Khmer•	Strong interpersonal and communication skills•	Results and quality oriented•	 Teamwork and cooperation•	Willing to learn and adapt new thing•	 High attention to details and accuracy•	Transparent with accounting procedures

Job Description:
• Respond to Admin works such as controlling office stationery, fixed asset, and office maintenance when necessary.

• Prepare administrative monthly report.

• Proven at least 1 years’ experience in Admin Field.
• Dynamic, highly committed, and able to work under pressure.
• Excellent in English
• Demonstrated organizational and administrative skills.
• Computer skills, including Ms. Word, Outlook, and Excel.
• Good interpersonal, presentation and communication skills.
• Good command in both spoken and written English.
